en: Peppa and George have been playing in the garden.
zh: 佩奇和乔治在花园里玩。

en: Peppa, where are your shoes?
zh: 佩奇，你的鞋子呢？

en: Oh, I've lost them.
zh: 哦，我鞋子丢了。

en: Well, I'm sure we can find them.
zh: 好啦，我确信我们能找到的。

en: Maybe we should try the garden?
zh: 也许我们试试到花园里找找？

en: Yes!
zh: 好的！

en: Everyone is looking for Peppa's shoes.
zh: 大家都在找佩奇的鞋子。

en: Mummy Pig is looking in the flowerbed.
zh: 猪妈妈在花坛里找。

en: Peppa's shoes are not there.
zh: 佩奇的鞋子不在那里。

en: Daddy Pig is looking in the wheelbarrow.
zh: 猪爸爸在手推车里找。

en: Peppa's shoes are not there.
zh: 佩奇的鞋子不在那。

en: Peppa and George look in the flowerpots.
zh: 佩奇和乔治在花盆里找。

en: Peppa's shoes are not there, either.
zh: 佩奇的鞋子也不在那。

en: We've looked everywhere, but we can't find Peppa's shoes!
zh: 我们已经到处找了，但是我们找不到佩奇的鞋子！

en: Peppa's shoes are lost.
zh: 佩奇的鞋子丢失了。

en: Now I haven't got any shoes to wear.
zh: 现在我没有鞋子穿了。

en: Poor Peppa. Your shoes were getting a bit old.
zh: 可怜的佩奇。你的鞋子有点旧了

en: We'll buy you a new pair!
zh: 我们给你买双新鞋！

en: Can my new shoes be red, Mummy?
zh: 妈妈，我的新鞋可以是红色的吗？

en: Of course, they can.
zh: 当然可以啦。

en: George! I'm going to have new red shoes!
zh: 乔治！我有红色新鞋子穿了！

en: Mummy Pig and Peppa are at Miss Rabbit's shoe shop.
zh: 猪妈妈和佩奇来到兔小姐的鞋店里。

en: Hello, Miss Rabbit.
zh: 你好，兔小姐。

en: Hello, Mummy Pig.
zh: 你好，猪妈妈。

en: We would like to buy some new shoes for Peppa, please.
zh: 我们想买双新鞋给佩奇。

en: Red Shoes!
zh: 红色的鞋子！

en: Oh I'm sure we can find you some lovely new shoes, Peppa!
zh: 哦，佩奇，我确信我们能给你找一双漂亮的新鞋子！

en: Red ones, please.
zh: 红色的。

en: Of course, red ones.
zh: 没问题，红色的。

en: Wow! New red shoes!
zh: 哇！红色的新鞋子！

en: George and Daddy Pig are playing draughts.
zh: 乔治和猪爸爸在下跳棋。

en: Oh, well done, George.
zh: 哦，做得好，乔治。

en: Daddy! Daddy!
zh: 爸爸！爸爸！

en: Look at my new shoes!They are red!
zh: 看看我的新鞋子！是红色的！

en: I see! They are red.
zh: 我看到了！是红色的。

en: Mummy, do you like my new shoes?
zh: 妈妈，你喜欢我的新鞋子吗？

en: Yes, Peppa, they make you look very smart.
zh: 是的，佩奇，他们让你看起来很漂亮。

en: George, do you like my new shoes?
zh: 乔治，你喜欢我的新鞋子吗？

en: Everyone likes Peppa's new shoes.
zh: 大家都喜欢佩奇的新鞋子。

en: I like my new shoes so much.
zh: 我太喜欢我的新鞋子了。

en: I don't want to ever take them off.
zh: 我永远都不想把它脱下来。

en: It is bath time.
zh: 洗澡时间到了。

en: Peppa wants to keep her new shoes on, even for her bath.
zh: 即使是洗澡，佩奇也不想脱下新鞋子。

en: Peppa is in her pajamas.
zh: 佩奇穿着睡衣。

en: She still has her new shoes on.
zh: 但她仍然穿着新鞋子。

en: Peppa even wants to wear her new shoes in bed!
zh: 佩奇甚至还穿着新鞋子睡觉！

en: Peppa, are you sure you don't want to take your shoes off?
zh: 佩奇，你确定你不想脱下你的鞋子？

en: I don't want to ever take my new shoes off, Mummy.
zh: 妈妈，我永远也不想脱下我的新鞋子。

en: Very well. Goodnight, Peppa and George.
zh: 那好吧。晚安，佩奇和乔治。

en: Goodnight, Mummy! Goodnight, Daddy!
zh: 晚安，妈妈！晚安，爸爸！

en: Goodnight, my little piggies!
zh: 晚安，我的小猪们！

en: It has been raining all night and now the garden is very wet.
zh: 下了一整夜的雨现在花园很潮湿。

en: Mummy Pig is wearing her boots.
zh: 猪妈妈穿着她的靴子。

en: Daddy Pig is wearing his boots.
zh: 猪爸爸穿着他的靴子。

en: George is wearing his boots.
zh: 乔治也穿着他的靴子。

en: Peppa is still wearing her new red shoes.
zh: 佩奇仍然穿着她的红色新鞋子。

en: George is going to play in the wet grass.
zh: 乔治在潮湿的草丛里玩。

en: Oh, dear. Peppa loves playing in the wet grass,
zh: 哦，糟糕了。佩奇喜欢在潮湿的草丛里玩。

en: but she doesn't want to get her new shoes wet.
zh: 但是她不想把新鞋子弄湿。

en: I can't play in the wet grass, George.
zh: 乔治，我不能在潮湿的草丛里玩。

en: George loves jumping in muddy puddles.
zh: 乔治喜欢在泥坑里跳。

en: Peppa loves jumping in puddles,
zh: 佩奇也喜欢在泥坑里跳。

en: but she doesn't want to get her new shoes muddy.
zh: 但她不想新鞋子粘上泥。

en: Mummy and Daddy love jumping up and down in muddy puddles!
zh: 妈妈和爸爸喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去！

en: Everyone likes jumping in muddy puddles!
zh: 大家都喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去！

en: Where is Peppa going?
zh: 佩奇要去哪？

en: Peppa is putting on her boots!
zh: 佩奇穿上了她的靴子！

en: If you jump in muddy puddles, you must wear your boots!
zh: 如果你在泥坑里跳，你必须要穿上你的靴子！
